name: Dampened Spirits
giver: Maven Black-Briar (via Mercer Frey / Thieves Guild patronage)
description: Maven wants Honningbrew Meadery ruined so Black-Briar Mead can dominate. Mallus Maccius is her plant inside the business. Your job: make the meadery fail publicly while keeping the trail away from Maven and the Guild.

objectives.description: Reach Honningbrew Meadery and make contact with the situation on-site (guards, Sabjorn, staff).
Identify and secure leverage regarding the sabotage (Mallus's role, the skeever breeding, poison supplies, or ledgers).
Sabotage Honningbrew's product or operations in a way that forces an official failure event (contract loss, arrest, shutdown, etc.).
Report back to Maven / the Guild with proof of completion and keep Maven unexposed.

rewards.reputation: +? with Thieves Guild / Maven (GM set on completion)

notes: This quest is adapted to the campaign's civil-war timeline; keep sabotage discreet to avoid Thalmor attention.
